title: The Desperado
description: When Willow Kane set out in search of her missing sister, she never imagined she'd have to go back a century to find her...or that she'd find love in the form of a reckless renegade named Ryder. With his devastating good looks, Ryder was a dead ringer for the Sundance Kid, with a reputation to match.With a bounty on his head, Ryder's only mission should have been to clear his name. Then a baffling beauty inexplicably saved him from the hangman's noose and declared adamantly that she was not from his time. Suddenly, understanding Willow's appearance in his life was Ryder's only desire.A century weighed heavily between them, as did a question on both their minds: Could their love transcend the boundaries of time?
author: Patricia Rosemoor
